item.title: Hermes: A Large Language Model Framework on the Journey to Autonomous Networks
item.description: Hermes, a novel LLM-based framework, automates cellular network modeling by generating explainable ‘blueprints’ for constructing Network Digital Twins (NDTs), paving the way for fully autonomous netwo…
